summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a revised motion and redline concerning birth certificates, likely related to evidentiary proceedings in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting a revised legal motion regarding birth certificates.

events.title: Transmission of Revised Birth Certificates Motion
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a revised motion and redline concerning birth certificates via email.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A revised legal motion concerning birth certificates was transmitted by a federal prosecutor on November 19, 2021.
The document includes a redline version showing changes from a previous draft.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating ongoing federal legal proceedings.
